item.description:
Hi,
I hope you are fine. I have another exciting announcement. We are continuing this exciting new season with another popular and timely presentation by James Gage. What everyone wants to know about Lease Options, Probate, Short Sales, etc.. This is an information packed exposition, by the an expert on Ma. R.E. investing. James Gage also has a very extensive bio.he is an attorney and a long-time investor in Mass. and in other states. You won't want to miss this informative, timely, valuable revelation of many unknown and mostly unexplored ideas that could make you wealthy, beyond your wildest dreams.
This event will fill up fast. If you are interested, please respond now. I don't want you to be disappointed, by being shut out. dale

P.S. Several of us who have profited from this material, will be on hand to tell our stories.
P.P.S. I will forward another email with his full bio.
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club November Meetup
